reviewText: Extraordinary conversation between Rupert Spira and Chris Hebard. A MUST SEE!  Prepare to have your mind blown.

Content was beautiful.  DVD itself does not work properly, the intro loops and does not return to menu. I have to reinsert, then bypass the intro, to get to the other content.  But I kept it because the content is so good. I tried two DVD's both had the same problem.
If you are truly interested in finding out who you are and the nature of Reality, Rupert's talks and books will take you there. He has a clear precise way of pointing to your true nature.
Difficult to understand in connection with bad hearing. Not. spoken very articulate.  The content of the discussion is very, very enlightening.
This was an amazing interview.  I love every moment.  Rupert Spira is a genius at guiding you to look at patterns of belief that you would never think to look at.
